title: MIBRO 524500 Cold Chisel Set, 1/2in. to 7/8in., 4 Pieces
features: Made of tough Chrome Vanadium steel on a 200 to forge for strength
Cutting Edges are strong with out being brittle
description: This 4-Piece Cold Chisel set from Mibro - a 60 plus year old company selected as one of Canada's "50 Best Managed Companies" includes 1/2-Inch, 5/8-Inch, 3/4-Inch and 7/8-Inch chisels. They are made of Chrome Vanadium which is stronger than regular alloy steel. Tips will stay sharp longer. Black oxide finish resist corrosion. The cutting edge is strong not brittle with a Rockwell C55 rating. These are mostly used for metal work.
